node.text:
In April 2002, RIEDEL introduced their glass for Tequila, designed to highlight the finest characteristics of Mexico’s national drink. 

Designated the Official Tequila Glass by the Consejo Regulador del Tequila, this glass was designed to enhance Mexico’s finest Reposados, Añejos and Reservas de Casa Tequilas. 

The glass was designed at two tasting workshops led by Georg Riedel and attended by over two dozen Tequila producers, officials and cognoscenti, using twelve 100% Agave Tequila Reposado, aged eight months, including Don Julio’s Tres Magueyes and Casa Noble’s Cofradia.

It gives you the elegant experience that Tequila deserves! #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: Maximilian Riedel discusses his favourite spirit: Tequila!

node.text:
Discover the philosophy of Grape Varietal Specific glasses with the RIEDEL Tasting Sets. The functionality of our glasses is most clearly visible in a comparative tasting, and each set includes three to four different grape varietal specific glasses to allow you to compare the experience of the same wine in different shapes.

Each one of these glasses have been developed in a RIEDEL Sensory Workshop to suit the characteristics of the grape variety, based on knowledge developed over the last three generations of the Riedel family. 

The RIEDEL Tasting Sets are available at RIEDEL.com, and are the perfect gift for anyone who loves wine and wants to take their knowledge and enjoyment to the next level. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: Discover the key to wine with RIEDEL Tasting Sets

node.text:
Get tips from 11th generation @maxiriedel on the best way to polish and take care of your #RIEDEL glasses.

All our glasses are dishwasher safe - we recommend MIELE as the best machine.

If you want to give them a final polish by hand, we only ever use our RIEDEL Polishing Cloths for a perfect result. Shop them now via RIEDEL.com or your local retailer.

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: How to polish your RIEDEL glasses

node.text:
As our second most popular series, the success of “O” is easy to understand: casual, contemporary and space-saving, it’s perfect for those who crave elegant and uncomplicated products for everyday use.

11th generation @maxiriedel discusses its versatility, why it’s practical for every day, and answers the most common customer question: won’t my wine warm up more quickly in a stemless glass? Watch to find out!

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: RIEDEL “O" - The Original Stemless Wine Tumbler

node.text:
Over 20 years ago, #Hennessy asked RIEDEL to help them find the ideal glass for cognac. The cooperation led to the development of a glass that demanded a new way of thinking from traditional cognac lovers.

Hennessy now strongly recommends the use of the slender and functional glass that RIEDEL offers to the market; find out how and why it works with 11th generation @maxiriedel. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: The development of the RIEDEL Cognac glass

node.text:
Discover more about the history of champagne glasses and learn how to best serve your favourite champagne. What’s the difference between the coupe, the flute, and the wine glass, when it comes to delivery of aroma and flavour? 11th generation Maximilian Riedel takes you through the options to show you how to get more from the wines you love. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
​With the historic RIEDEL lettering in its centre, the RIEDEL Decanter was created in homage to sixth-generation Josef Riedel Senior, also known as the ‘Glass King of the Jizera Mountains’. ⁠✨
 ​⁠
 Under Josef’s control, the company developed into one of the largest and most successful in Europe at that time. The RIEDEL lettering, inspired by the Art Nouveau movement, was used as the signet for all its products between 1890 and 1925. It was then reintroduced in 1996 on the occasion of RIEDEL’s 240th anniversary celebrating their handmade and free-blown products. ⁠
 ​⁠
 Add this historic piece to your collection:
​🍷 RIEDEL Decanter
​
​Or read the full story of our eleven generations at the RIEDEL.com blog
 ⁠📖 265 Years of RIEDEL Glass: A Story of 11 Generations
 ​
 ​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
We are often asked: How do I clean my #RIEDELDecanter? 
 
A wine decanter is an essential instrument for any wine lover, allowing you to access greater aromas and deeper flavours - so don't let cleaning and care stop you from using it! 
​
🧼 Rinse out any leftover wine with warm water
​🧽 Fill with clean warm water and leave to soak overnight
​🧼 Empty water out and soap the outside with dishwashing liquid
​​🧽 Rinse well with warm water, inside and out, making sure no soap gets inside
​🧼 Polish your decanter with a ​#RIEDEL Polishing Cloth
​🧽 If your decanter still contains any water, use a hairdryer on a warm/cool setting to dry completely. Perfect!
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
We are very excited to share this beautiful video from @barbajeanmalta, showing off our limited edition #RIEDEL & #BarbaJean decanter! 💚🤍
​
​"It still feels like a dream! We are completely over the moon and humbled with gratitude for this once in a lifetime opportunity given to us by @riedel_official. They have chosen us, Barbajean, as their first collaboration in Malta to create a number of limited edition decanters! We couldn't have marked our one year in an even more special way."
​
​DM the Barbajean team if you're interested in purchasing one or email us at info@riedel.com to find out more about your own #RIEDELcollaboration!
​
​📹 : @barbajeanmalta

node.text:
We're always being asked to provide guidance to our customers on how to start their #RIEDEL wine glass collection. Does this sound like you?

​Good news, we've got a new blog on RIEDEL.com with some tips.​ 
​
​Firstly, consider some key questions:
🍷 What do you like to drink?
🍷 What’s your budget?
🍷 What’s your home set up?
🍷 What’s your style?
​
​Then head over to our blog to discover next steps!
​
​🍷 Wine Cabernet/Merlot & Wine Riesling/Zinfandel

node.text:
Maximilian Riedel sure knows how to enjoy rosé!
​
​If you're a ​rosé lover, the #RIEDEL Extreme Rosé glass is a must-have 💕
​
​This diamond-shaped machine-made glass is the perfect choice to reveal the bouquet and freshness of rosé wines. ​The shape brings out aromas, and balances its fresh fruitiness with its high acidity. 
 ​
​Find it at RIEDEL.com!
 ​
 ​🍷 RIEDEL Extreme Rosé Wine/Rosé Champagne Glass
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by RIEDEL The Wine Glass Company on August 20, 2021.

node.text:
Did you miss the chance to celebrate #InternationalPinotNoirDay this Wednesday?

Good news - the weekend is here​! Enjoy a glass of Pinot Noir and share with us which RIEDEL glass you're drinking it from!
​
​🍷 RIEDEL Veritas Old World Pinot Noir
​​
​#RIEDEL 📸 : @kimpixphoto
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by RIEDEL The Wine Glass Company on August 19, 2021 tagging @kateandkon. May be an image of 3 people, people standing and outdoors.

node.text:
RIEDEL is thrilled to share a long-term partnership with Austrian business @kateandkon. 🍷 
​
​Led by Konstantin Wolf, Katharina Wolf, and Florian Wolf-Haidegger, their business philosophy centres on the pleasure that wine creates, and how it brings people together.
​
​In their words, "Living means for us at KATE & KON all that enriches life. All that you need and want to have. And so we have all the high-end glasses from RIEDEL in our assortment, which make the world of wine enjoyment even more beautiful. For us, there are no better wine glasses to drink from."
​
​Here at RIEDEL, there is nothing more exciting than sharing our passion for greater enjoyment with our partners and customers. Cheers! 🥂
​
​🍷 #RIEDEL Performance Cabernet & Cornetto Confetti Green
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by RIEDEL The Wine Glass Company on August 18, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and drink.

node.text:
Happy International Pinot Noir Day! 🍷​⁠
 ⁠
As Pinot Noir is so greatly affected by terrior and winemaking style, this fragile and elegant variety benefits enormously from the correct varietal glass. Stemmed or stemless, machine made or handmade, coloured, optic or clear, we have the ideal Pinot Noir glass to suit everyone's preference. 
​
​Our latest introduction is this piece from our SL RIEDEL Stemless Wings series, which was fine tuned by 10th generation Georg Riedel to ensure your wine​ truly sings.⁠
 ⁠
 What's your favourite #RIEDEL glass and Pinot Noir pairing?
​
​🍷 SL RIEDEL Stemless Wings Pinot Noir 
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly ⁠

node.text:
What makes the Eve Decanter one of @maxiriedel's favourite pieces?
​
​❤️ It was the first decanter he designed as part of our Snake series #ArtofDecanting 
​❤️ It is named after his beloved mother, Eva
​❤️ It features an intelligent "double decanting" feature thanks to the air pockets in its design
​❤️ It portions out the perfect amount required for one glass
​❤️ It speaks to you! 
​❤️ It impresses guests with its ingenuity and sense of fun
​
​The handmade Eve Decanter requires the skill of our best glassblowers, with each piece crafted at our factory in Kufstein, Austria.
​
​Wouldn't you love to have this incredible piece in your collection? 🐍
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
Let #RIEDEL be your guide when it comes to the world of decanting. ​
​
Red, white, or champagne, young or old wines, we're here to help you achieve greater enjoyment.
​
​Have a question about decanting? Comment below!
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly
